
Run this from the website/stat436_s24 root directory

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(rmarkdown)
library(distill)

files <- list.files(pattern = ".*week08-01.*\\.Rmd", full.names = TRUE, recursive = TRUE)
files <- setdiff(files, c("./about.Rmd", "./index.Rmd"))
#map(files[grepl("week07", files)], ~ {
map(files, ~ {
  select <- dplyr::select
  render(.)
})
render_site()
```
